title: The Peg House
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. General store with a cafe and live music space. Multiple vegan and vegetarian items on menu including a tempeh reuben, veggie dog, and a veggie burger which are either vegan or can be made vegan. Also has vegan coleslaw,chili and nachos. Serves local beers. Deli also on premises and often have vegan foods such as cheese, almond yogurt, cream cheese and more. All coffee drinks and espressos can be made vegan as usually has a variety of nut/rice milks. Wi-fi with password.
